project: AI Candidate Filtering System - Cleanup & Fixes
description: Fix inconsistencies between old and new workflows, update homepage, and ensure all features work end-to-end

userStories.title: Update Homepage to New Workflow
userStories.description: As a user, I want the homepage to work with the new role-based workflow so there are no broken links or forms
acceptanceCriteria: Remove or update the old /run POST form on homepage
Show recent runs from the new system
Homepage clearly explains the new workflow: Create Role → Upload Docs → Configure Criteria → Test → Run

userStories.title: Verify All API Endpoints Work
userStories.description: As a developer, I need all API endpoints to return proper responses and handle errors gracefully
acceptanceCriteria: All endpoints return proper error messages (not 404 for valid routes)
Document working API endpoints in README or API docs

userStories.title: End-to-End Workflow Verification
userStories.description: As a user, I want to complete a full candidate evaluation workflow without errors
acceptanceCriteria: Can upload a CSV of candidates
Can configure criteria (manually or via AI extraction)
Can run a test evaluation on 50 candidates
Can approve and run full evaluation
Can view and export final results
No JavaScript console errors during workflow
